about-first-paragraph: Hi! I'm Alan Erriu, a backend developer based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
about-second-paragraph: I am currently part of the team at EXTRADOS Software Technology, working as a backend developer with .NET. I always prioritize agile methodologies and clear communication, which are essential for a team's success.
about-third-paragraph: My focus is on learning by creating, as reflected in my portfolio, where I showcase several GitHub projects ranging from complete applications to API solutions with .NET.
about-fourth-paragraph: My technical skills: .NET, ORM, Swagger, Web Forms, API, JWT, SQL Server, GitHub, Scrum.
about-fifth-paragraph: I have also developed and deployed several frontend applications with React, which helps me understand the needs of frontend teammates when building APIs in the backend.
project-description-API-Ecommerce-Extrad: User registration, token-based login, roles, CRUD operations for users, products, and offers with expiration dates, timezone handling.
project-description-WebForm-CRUD: User registration and a simple login, complete CRUD for employees.
project-description-mantenimiento: Service website for home maintenance: Painting, plumbing, etc.
